ComicInfo.Title: Bomb Warnings!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:10:52. [CVDB145187] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 22:48:00. [Issue ID 243538]
ComicInfo.Characters: Professor Winkly,Elvira, Mistress of the Dark,Lulu,Goodzillas
ComicInfo.Summary: Bomb Warnings!: Elvira is helping to clean Professor Winkly's laboratory. When she comes across a pile of papers she takes them to Lulu, her #1 fan, to organize. Elvira goes to the dock to pick up a shipment for Professor Winkly, but the shipment and Elvira are stolen, then delivered to a castle by truck. Inside, Elvira encounters the monster mob members, Goodzillas, playing poker. Elvira, literally, beats them at their own game.
